name: Xenophyte
description:
The Xenophyte application was developed to aid distant troubled seed worlds. A set of gleaner droids will be at your disposal. The vast distances of space result in turn based interaction with our droids. Use these droids to collect resources, craft items, capture malfunctioning droids, identify species, uncover relics, aid settlements, and identify plants.

Gameplay

Xenophyte contains rogue-like elements such as random maps, turn based movement, and random real world plants for each seed world. Commanding a gleaner droid is involves sneaking around using the environment for cover. Species data and relics persist between games, find them all.

The game does involve real world plants. Real plant attributes are used to identify a plant when enough samples have been gathered.
